BG3 Ranger Tips & Builds

NEW SUBCLASS, Swarmkeeper, will be added in Patch 8. Beast Master summons is limited to Bear, Boar, Dire Raven, Wolf, or Wolf Spider. Choose Beastmaster for a summoned animal companion or Gloomstalker for enhanced mobility and bonus damage on your first turn.
